title: Troubleshooting Valve Issues Using A Voltmeter

tasks.task: Troubleshoot a malfunctioning sprinkler system zone using a voltmeter.
subtasks: Verify the controller is working properly by measuring voltage.
Check the common wire terminal on the controller.
Assess the voltage reading when the suspect zone is activated.
Evaluate the resistance between the common terminal and zone terminal.
Investigate potential issues with the solenoid or wiring at the valve box.
Use online resources or valve specifications for further diagnostics.
